vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
Unitroller.fallback (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3129-3144) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3131-3133)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: XVS.getChainId (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3485-3492) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1263-1324) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1289)
	-transferFrom (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1303)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
XVS._writeCheckpoint (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3451-3464) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken._addReservesInternal (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2571-2583):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2572-2573)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2579-2580)

Reentrancy in VToken._reduceReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2634-2644):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2635-2636)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2641-2642)

Reentrancy in VToken._setComptroller (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2503-2522):

	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2511-2512)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2514-2515)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountAssets (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3924-3925)
	- accountAssets (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#3925-3926)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:

	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2278)
	- error = vTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2284)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,vTokenCollateral) (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2291)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#2291)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in VToken.redeemFresh (ComptrollerScenarioG1.sol#1938-2058):
	External calls:
